newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian air cargo demand expected up in road strike.
newsitem.headline: Indian air cargo demand expected up in road strike.

text.p: BOMBAY, March 30, Reuter - Demand for air cargo services is expected to increase significantly if truck unions go ahead with their national strike from 12:01 a.m. Tuesday (1830 GMT Monday), an Indian Airlines Corp cargo official said in Bombay on Saturday.
He said the airline had already been expecting an increase in traffic as it was the financial year end when many companies tried to use up their transport budgets.
